# HKMetadataKeyInsulinDeliveryReason

**Global Variable**

The medical reason for administering insulin.

## Declaration

```swift
let HKMetadataKeyInsulinDeliveryReason: String
```

## Discussion

This key is required for [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKQuantityTypeIdentifier/insulinDelivery] samples. It takes an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSNumber] object containing a [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKInsulinDeliveryReason] value.

## Valid Delivery Reasons

- **HKInsulinDeliveryReason**: Possible reasons for administering insulin.
title: HKMetadataKeyInsulinDeliveryReason
